long_description: Delicious Organic Hammer Bars(TM) are packed with natural energy sources that'll keep you going strong in a marathon or just the daily rat race. Hammer Bar combines alkalizing protein and healthy carbohydrates for maximum sustained energy. Naturally occurring enzymes aid digestion and absorption of nutrients. Bar supplies your body with healthy essential fatty acids for increased endurance and mental clarity. USDA Organic, non-dairy kosher and vegan. Specifications based on a range of flavors; nutrition facts displayed here and on wrapper may differ; information on wrapper reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
